name: nyc.scatter.depthkit.live
description:
Use the Depthkit Spout Livestream Player to receive Depthkit combined-per-pixel livestreams using the Spout receiver from Keijiro Takahshi.

Note this requires configuring Keijiroâ€™s registry as a Scoped Registry in Package Manager Settings. Read how to do this here: https://github.com/keijiro/KlakSpout
